page.title: 06Education-Cookley Green area
page.content: Children from this area attend state primary schools in Nettlebed or Nuffield, a distance of 4/5 miles. They are taken to and from school by buses run by the local authority. Children of secondary school age attend state schools in Henley until they are aged 16, then they go to King James 6th Form College or Henley Technical College. Secondary school children are also collected by bus for their 8 mile journey. Parents can choose to educate their children in private fee paying schools. There are special schools and units to provide education for children with special needs. These schools can be either privately or state owned. None of these schools are in this area.
